title: Covid-19 Analysis: Afghanistan
description: This blog contains an analysis on the no. of cases and deaths in the year 2021 for Afghanistan and a comparison of these numbers with the time in the first half and the second half of the year i.e. before and during the on-going crises in Afghanistan.

title: Welcome visitor! Thanks so much for stopping by.
description: The purpose of this blog is to share my story of analysis via data using interactive tables and plots.
contents:
This blog consists of COVID-19 data analysis for Afghanistan as of now. Please click on ‘Blogs’ (top right) to navigate to the reading material i.e. COVID-19 Analysis: Afghanistan.
Thank you!
Enjoy reading.
